id.description: A globally unique (UUID) identifier for the user

barcode.description: The unique library barcode for this user

active.description: A flag to determine if the user's account is effective and not expired. The tenant configuration can require the user to be active for login. Active is different from the loan patron block

patronGroup.description: A UUID corresponding to the group the user belongs to, see /groups API, example groups are undergraduate and faculty; loan rules, patron blocks, fees/fines and expiration days can use the patron group
